code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input  logic        clk,
    input  logic        areset,
    input  logic [7:0]  d,
    output logic [7:0]  q
);

    // Implementing 8 D flip-flops with active high asynchronous reset
    always_ff @(posedge clk or posedge areset) begin
        if (areset) begin
            q <= 8'b00000000;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
